dcterms:creator: A.M. Brouwer
M.A. Hogervorst
B. Oudejans
A.J. Ries
J. Touryan
dcterms:description: Participants performed a guided visual search task and an auditory math task simultaneously (dual-task, high workload) or a guided visual search task only (single-task, low workload). EEG data were recorded using a 32-channel BioSemi ActiveTwo system.
dcterms:title: DS_LOAD

dcterms:creator: C.T. Lin
R.C. Wu
T.P. Jung
S.F. Liang
T.Y. Huang
dcterms:description: Participants underwent a simulated driving experiment, maintaining lane position while responding to laterally directed perturbations. EEG data were recorded using a 33-channel Compumedics Neuroscan system.
dcterms:title: DS_ALERT

dcterms:creator: A.J. Ries
J. Touryan
B. Ahrens
P. Connolly
dcterms:description: Participants performed a guided visual search task in parallel with a second binaurally presented auditory task. EEG data were recorded using a 64-channel BioSemi ActiveTwo system.
dcterms:title: DS_VALIDATE_LOAD

dcterms:creator: N. Mei
M.D. Grossberg
K. Ng
K.T. Navarro
T.M. Ellmore
dcterms:description: Participants took brief naps after performing a visual working memory task. EEG data were recorded using a 64 channel antiCHamp active electrode system.
dcterms:title: DS_VALIDATE_ALERT

dcterms:creator: J.S. Metcalfe
A.R. Marathe
B. Haynes
V.J. Paul
G.M. Gremillion
K. Drnec
K. Atwater
J.R. Estepp
J.R. Lukos
E.C. Carter
W.D. Nothwang
dcterms:description: Participants performed a simulated driving task while perched atop a six-degree-of-freedom ride motion simulator. EEG data were recorded using a 64-channel BioSemi ActiveTwo system.
dcterms:title: DS_COMPLEX
